insert_persona: INSERT INTO persona (nom_persona, apellido_perso) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id_persona
insert_username: INSERT INTO usuario (nom_usu, correo_usu, contra_usu, id_persona) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
getAllUsers: SELECT nombre_usu as usuario FROM usuario
verifyUser: SELECT DISTINCT id_usuario as userId, nom_usu AS username, correo_usu as email FROM usuario WHERE LOWER(nom_usu) = LOWER($1)
verifyPassword: SELECT contra_usu as password FROM usuario WHERE nom_usu = $1
getNotes: SELECT n.titu_nota AS titu_nota, n.conte_nota AS conte_nota, cat.des_categoria AS categoria, n.favorito AS favorito FROM nota n INNER JOIN categoria cat ON n.id_categoria = cat.id_categoria WHERE n.id_usuario = $1;
createNote: INSERT INTO nota (titu_nota, conte_nota, id_usuario, id_categoria, favorito, id_carpeta) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) RETURNING id_nota
updateNote: UPDATE nota SET titu_nota = $1, conte_nota = $2, id_categoria = $3, favorito = $4 WHERE id_nota = $5
verifyOwner: SELECT id_usuario AS owner FROM nota WHERE id_nota = $1
getFolders: SELECT c.id_carpeta, c.des_carpeta, COUNT(n.id_nota) AS num_notas FROM carpeta c LEFT JOIN nota n ON c.id_carpeta = n.id_carpeta WHERE c.id_usuario = $1 GROUP BY c.id_carpeta, c.des_carpeta ORDER BY num_notas DESC;
updateFolder: UPDATE carpeta SET des_carpeta = $1 WHERE id_carpeta = $2
deleteNoteFromFolder: UPDATE nota SET id_carpeta = NULL WHERE id_nota = $1
